sentences.sContent: She was wearing dark blue pants and a white sweater.
sentences.sCn: 她穿着深蓝色长裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.sContent: ...Would you like to see those pants in brown and navy blue...

trans.tranCn: 长裤， 便裤； 内裤
trans.tranOther: a piece of clothing that covers you from your waist to your feet and has a separate part for each leg
